name: Forest Spider
description: A dog-sized spider with glistening fangs and bristly legs. Its many eyes reflect the dim forest light.

name: Giant Spider
description: A massive arachnid the size of a horse, its body armored with thick chitin plates. Venom drips from its fangs.

name: Goblin
description: A small, wiry creature with green skin, pointed ears, and a nasty grin. It brandishes a rusty dagger.

name: Goblin Chief
description: A hulking goblin wearing a crude iron crown. Scars criss-cross its muscular arms, and it wields a heavy mace with practiced ease.

name: Wild Wolf
description: A lean gray wolf with bared fangs and matted fur. Its amber eyes track your every movement with predatory focus.

name: Bandit
description: A rough-looking human in tattered clothes, wielding a notched short sword. Desperation burns in their eyes.

name: Cave Bat Swarm
description: A shrieking cloud of bats bursts from the darkness, their leathery wings beating the air in a frenzy.

name: Stone Golem
description: An animated construct of rough-hewn stone, glowing runes etched into its surface. It moves with surprising speed for its bulk.
